product_name: NiteRider Lighting Bug USB 100 Bike Light
long_description: Lighting the path of commuters and riders looking to take on their first adventure in the dark, the NiteRider Lightning Bug USB 100 front bike light makes it easy to see and be seen. LED offers 100 lumens (high setting) to brighten your path and enhance visibility to oncoming motorists; also offers a low setting and a safety flashing mode. Internal lithium ion battery can be charged from the USB port of your computer, making charging at the office a snap; 2.5 hr. maximum charge time. Battery indicator lets you know when it's time to recharge the NiteRider Lightning Bug USB 100 front bike light.
short_description: Lighting the path of commuters and riders looking to take on their first adventure in the dark, the NiteRider Lightning Bug USB 100 front bike light makes it easy to see and be seen.
